#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

A sort of "last man standing" robo rally where players compete with their Javascript object.

= Details =

*Version 1.0:*
 * Commands
   * Movements
     * forward, 
     * left
     * back
     * right
   * Shoot (straight forward)
   * Look
 * Playground is plain simple without anything. Configurable size.

User can paste code for his/her bot into web page on central web page.



*Version 2.0:*
 Configurable bots when starting.
